EmailTemplate.name: NSCP Welcome Email
EmailTemplate.subject: NSCP Registrant Portal
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Receiving_User.FirstName},
Welcome to {!Community_Name}! To get started, Click Here to set your password.
Username: {!Receiving_User.Username}
Once you set your password from the link above you may login where you will able to renew, apply, and review & edit your information.
To renew your registration, login and navigate to the "Registrations" tab, you will see a sub tab called "Registration Actions", follow the prompts on that page to renew your registration.
If you do not have enough professional development credits you will not be able to renew, please go to the "Professional Development" tab to add them
Thanks, {!Organization.Name}
